techmeme.title: A look at the national security fears around Microsoft's deal with Abu Dhabi's G42, including US DOD's skepticism that G42 will entirely uncouple from China (Bloomberg)
VFX company DNEG raised $200M from Abu Dhabi's UASG at a $2B valuation, to expand its division Brahma, which is developing an AI-powered, photo-real CGI creator (Melanie Goodfellow/Deadline)
The Biden administration awards $504M in funding for 12 regional tech hubs, including in New York and Florida, to expand research in AI, chip making, and more (Bloomberg)
Tubi launches in the UK with more than 20,000 movies and TV episodes, featuring content from distributors including Disney, Lionsgate, NBCU, and Sony Pictures (Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter)
Revolut's 2023 revenue almost doubled to £1.8B, after interest income grew to £500M from £83M in 2022; auditor BDO gave its accounts a clean bill of health (Aisha S Gani/Bloomberg)
